official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating April 1 through 7, 1979, "National Medic Alert Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of April 1 through 7, 1979, as "National Medic Alert Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating April 1 through 7, 1979, "National Medic Alert Week".
